A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
At this point even the greatest shills have to admit that beyond its SJW fassade\, the last jedi is nothing more than a visually stunning hit piece on everything that was Star Wars. 

Beloved characters got humiliated and are wasted in a sub-par storyline full of plot holes and ideologically driven events.

This movie is not just a disaster by itself\, but a disaaster to the overall franchise. The subsequent box office disaster of Solo says it all.

Star Wars is in big trouble and Episode IX is unlikely to save it.

The Star Wars franchise now\, sadly\, needs a reset to have fightimg chance to heal and get back on its feet.

Shame on the people responsible for this mess at Lucasfilm and Disney.
